channel.title: Mystic Class?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Mystic Class?"

item.title: Re: Mystic Class?
item.content:encoded: Wooo thank you guys for working out how to fix it <3

item.title: Re: Mystic Class?
item.content:encoded:
Sorry I wasn't around to help with that ListPages module, feel bad since I was the one who first found it and used it to update the spell pages lol. Looks like you got it figured out though.

I added the Mystic class to the test home page in the Obsolete UA section and also moved the Rune Scribe there as well. Let me know if that works for you guys.

item.title: Re: Mystic Class?
item.content:encoded: Alright it took some doing but I think I got it to work. When you're making the discipline pages, make sure to click on "tags" and add the order it's associated with (avatar, awakened, immortal, nomad, or wu-jen). It should add it to the page automatically.

item.title: Re: Mystic Class?
item.content:encoded: hmm I'll see if I can work on getting the same formatting as the spell page, but it might take a bit. The code for that page is a little beyond my paygrade, but I think it'll be nice if we can get the discipline page to have the same organizing tabs for the subclasses as the spell page has for spell levels. The first discipline page you put up looks good so far, just need to make a page to put it all.

item.title: Re: Mystic Class?
item.content:encoded:
Haha I have no idea what the hell im doing can someone point out whats wrong with this (Or edit it a bit to fix my stupidity) then Ill be able to finish with the disciplines and we can call the work on the mystic done I think?

heres the main discipline page (http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/mystic:disciplines)

and heres the first discipline page (http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/discipline:adaptive-body)

thanks

item.title: Re: Mystic Class?
item.content:encoded:
Ah, you have added the talents. Nice

i suppose ill see to the disciplines

item.title: Re: Mystic Class?
item.content:encoded:
Well, if I just ctrl c a buncha code off the invocations page, the talents page shouldnt be too hard to be honest.

The disciples would probably be better organized like the spell list thing, with the table and sub pages.

Ill see about getting started on the talents

Also, thank you so much for finishing up the subclasses <3

item.title: Re: Mystic Class?
item.content:encoded:
I think the only reason we haven't worked on the mystic in the past is because it's just so huge (the UA doc is ~30 pages). I know I've just been hesitant to start, but since you've begun working on it, share some of the links to the pages you're working on and I'll see what I can do to help.

Edit: nvm found the mystic page. Made some edits, finished the subclasses. All that's left are the psionic disciplines and talents, which unfortunately takes up 20 out of 28 pages ;—;

item.title: Re: Mystic Class?
item.content:encoded:
I have begun working on adding pages for the mystic, which are currently orphaned

I dont believe the mystic should be listed amongst the other classes, but should be listed in the 'Archived UA' section of the front page, and the rune-smith whatever prestiege class should be moved there.

if anyone would be willing to help with the mystic pages, it would be much appreciated

item.title: Re: Mystic Class?
item.content:encoded: Because it was revised into Psionics Wizard, which is likely coming out with Tasha's Cauldron

item.title: Re: Mystic Class?
item.content:encoded: the Rune whatever thingy is technically also not official and still has a page, but then again Mystic is both no longer endorsed by WotC and disliked by the playerbase, so it could make sense that it would not be on the wiki

item.title: Re: Mystic Class?
item.content:encoded: At least now, Artificer is official and Mystic isn't?

item.title: Mystic Class?
item.content:encoded: Is there a reason the Mystic class isn't on here but the Artificer is?
